resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/553</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/553</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Dinàmica</string>
            <string language="en">Dynamics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dynamik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dynamique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dinâmica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dynamics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυναμική</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Col.lecció d'exercicis i problemes sobre les lleis de Newton i les seves aplicacions. Consta d'una breu introducció teòrica, d'un exemple interactiu, de problemes amb la seva solució i resolució, i d'una autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">A collection of exercises and problems based on Newton's laws and their application.A brief theoretical introduction, an interactive activity, problems (with the way to solve them and the answers) and a self-assessment activity are included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mecànica (física)</string>
            <string language="en">mechanics (physics)</string>
            <string language="es">mecánica (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">física</string>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
            <string language="es">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Übungen und Probleme, die auf 
Gesetzen des Newtons und ihre application.A kurze theoretische 
Einleitung basieren, eine interaktive Aktivität, Probleme (mit der 
Methode, sie und die Antworten zu lösen) und eine Selbstbewertung 
Aktivität sind enthalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection d'exercices et problèmes basés 
sur les lois de newton et leur introduction théorique d'application.A
brève, une activité interactive, les problèmes (avec la voie de 
résoudre elles et les réponses) et une activité de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos exercícios e os problemas 
baseados em leis do newton e sua introdução teórica breve de 
application.A, uma atividade interativa, os problemas (com a maneira 
resolver as e as respostas) e uma atividade do self-assessment são 
incluídos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di esercitazioni e problemi basati 
sulle leggi del Newton e la loro introduzione teorica di application.A
breve, un'attività interattiva, i problemi (con il modo risolvere 
loro e le risposte) e un'attività di valutazione di se stesso sono 
inclusi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των ασκήσεων και των προβλημάτων 
βασισμένων στους νόμους Newton και την αίτησή τους Μια 
συνοπτική θεωρητική εισαγωγή, μια διαλογική δραστηριότητα, τα 
προβλήματα (με τον τρόπο να λυθούν αυτοί και οι απαντήσεις) και 
μια δραστηριότητα αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker (Physik)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique (physique)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos (física)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici (fisica)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί (φυσική)</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
